price: យើងមិនបានបង្កើតមេឃជាច្រើនជាន់ និងផែនដី ហើយ និងអ្វីៗដែលមាននៅរវាងវាទាំងពីរជាការលេងសើចឡើយ។
arabic: وَمَا خَلَقۡنَا ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَا لَٰعِبِينَ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: wamā khalaqnā al-samāwāti wal-arḍa wamā baynahumā lāʿibīna
